page.title: 04** DEPUTY LORD MAYOR **
page.content: {Interview with the Deputy Lord Mayor {of Leeds,and the Deputy Lady Mayoress} As part of our Domesday Survey, we were waiting outside Mr. Hyde's shop when he returned from Seacroft Hospital where he had been delivering newspapers and sweets. To do this Councillor Hyde got up at 7 a.m. that morning. Mr. Hyde left for home and returned shortly as Councillor Hyde. When Councillor Hyde arrived in his Dorchester Limousine (GUA 333Y) he stepped out before his wife and began to answer our questions.This was my question:- "Do you have as many responsibilities as the Lord Mayor?" Councillor Hyde said that he didn't but he still had to go to the appointments because the Lord Mayor might need to be in two places at once.{Continued on page 5.
